formalpara.title: uClibc upgrade
formalpara.para: uClibc has been updated to version 0.9.30 plus additional updates from the uclibc.org repository as of June 2009. Programs linked with uClibc shared libraries from a previous version of &csl_sgxx; must be recompiled to run with the new version of uClibc.

formalpara.title: uClibc splice, vmsplice and tee functions
formalpara.para: uClibc now provides the functions splice, vmsplice and tee.

formalpara.title: Object file mismatch when linking
formalpara.para: A bug in uClibc that caused link failures with some -march or -mcpu option values has been fixed.

formalpara.title: uClibc memcpy and memmove functions
formalpara.para: A bug that caused the uClibc implementations of memcpy and memmove to return incorrect values has been fixed.

formalpara.title: Debugging uClibc ColdFire applications
formalpara.para: The uClibc library now includes additional DWARF information to assist stack unwinding operations in the debugger. This fixes a problem that formerly sometimes resulted in illegal memory accesses and uClinux kernel panics when debugging uClibc ColdFire applications.
